Cable Tray In Bhutan


Basket Cable Tray & Accessories


We manufacture a wide ride range of high quality cable trays in Bhutan. We are one of the best manufacturers, suppliers and exporters of basket cable trays in Bhutan .
Standard Length - 2500 / 3000 mm.
Thickness - 3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 6mm.
Height - 25mm,40mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 40mm, 50mm, 75mm, 100mm, 150mm, 300mm, 600mm, 750mm and 1000mm.
Finish - GI Basket Tray, Galvanised Basket Tray, GI Hot dip, SS Basket Tray.

Perforated Cable Trays & Accessories

We are one of the top Manufacturer, Supplier, and Exporter of a variety of Perforated type Cable Trays and their accessories (Welded type Perforated Cable Trays, Bolt and Nut Perforated type Cable Trays) in Bhutan.
Standard Length - 2500mm
Thickness - 1.2mm to 3mm
Height - 25mm,40mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 40mm, 50mm, 75mm, 100mm, 150mm, 300mm, 600mm, 750mm and 1000mm.
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629 and SS 202/304/316.

Ladder Type Cable Trays and Accessories

We are Manufacturer, Supplier, and Exporter of one of the best Ladder type Cable Trays in Bhutan. We manufacture all our products by using high quality materials to satisfy our client needs.
Standard Length - 2500mm.
Thickness -1.6mm to 3mm.
Height - 40mm,50mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 100mm,150mm, 300mm,450mm,600mm,750mm and 1000mm.
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629.

Raceways / Trunking & Accessories

We are one of the best Cable Tray manufacturers in Bhutan .Raceways are the most affordable and best way to run networking and power cables in IT Companies.
Standard Length - 2500mm.
Thickness - 1.2mm to 3mm.
Height - 30mm,40mm,50mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 40mm,50mm,75mm, 100mm,150mm, 300mm,450mm,600mm,750mm and 1000mm.
Finish - GI Hot dip, Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated and SS-202/304/316.
